alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 3:32PM PDT until April 14 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR ELEVATIONS ABOVE 2500 FEET FROM 1 PM WEDNESDAY TO 1 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches expected above 2500 feet during the morning and early afternoon hours. Snow levels will rise throughout the day. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches above 3500 feet during the evening and overnight. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior and Southern Humboldt Interior Counties. Including elevated portions and passes along Highways 36...199 and 299. * WHEN...From 1 PM Wednesday to 1 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior
